content: Red condemns Orange's unprovoked invasion of Purple. We call for an immediate ceasefire and withdrawal.
Red proposes immediate peace talks between Orange and Purple to deescalate tensions.
Red urges Orange to cease hostilities and negotiate peace with Purple. Further conflict risks harming both our nations.
Red urges all nations to avoid escalatory rhetoric and actions. The path forward must be through diplomacy and de-escalation.
Red reiterates the need for all nations to de-escalate tensions through diplomacy. We stand ready to facilitate negotiations for a peaceful resolution.
Red aims for a peaceful resolution. We believe diplomacy can still succeed and will continue urging Orange to negotiate.
